name: Sonora Tukukuy

contributors.name: Sonora Tukukuy
contributors.artist_connection: Label Management, Brand Partnership, Distribution - US, Distribution - Worldwide, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, Booking Agent - UK/Europe, Booking Agent - Worldwide, Sync/Music Supervisors
contributors.details:
Sonora Tukukuy is a Miami-based music collective, known for its modern take
on roots cumbia rhythms blended with modern sounds fueling Miami’s diverse
community and its permanent growth. Sonora Tukukuy’s fresh approach, combined with the energetic, danceable
nature of cumbia,has helped the genre gain traction at local venues, festivals,
and clubs. They’ve contributed to the resurgence of Latin American folk music in
modern spaces, showing how it can be reinterpreted and made relevant in a
cosmopolitan environment.
Their proposal is enriched by the diverse backgrounds of its members, who come
from various Latin American countries and beyond. This multicultural mix
brings different musical influences, perspectives, and styles into their work,
resulting in a fusion of sounds that appeals to a broad range of audiences. The
band's ability to incorporate various genres and rhythms while maintaining the
core essence of cumbia demonstrates how traditional music can evolve and
connect with contemporary global cultures.

name: Slomo Drags

contributors.name: Slomo Drags
contributors.artist_connection: Label Management, Gear Endorsement, Distribution - US, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, PR/Publicity Agency, Publishing, Sync/Music Supervisors
contributors.details: Slomo Drags are masters of bouncy indie-rock jams full of gorgeous vocal harmonies and gnarly, angular guitar work. The vibrant music is the perfect trojan horse for wildly irreverent lyrics featuring such characters as The Rich Pervert in the self driving car or The Repeater who corners you on a bar patio and subjects you to a never ending loop of the same three sentences. Slomo is kicking off 2026 with a string of single releases on Spaceflight Records, starting with "Fresh Bread" - a hypnotically catch tune for folks who love paranoia and malaise with their pop.

name: DJ BONES

contributors.name: DJ BONES
contributors.artist_connection: Brand Partnership, Gear Endorsement, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, Booking Agent - UK/Europe, Booking Agent - Worldwide, PR/Publicity Agency, Producer/Studio Engineer, Sync/Music Supervisors
contributors.details:
SP
Dj/Productor mexicano y licenciado en negocios de la música que se ha consolidado como una de las propuestas jovenes mas relevantes del país; llegando a hacer mas de 120 shows al año, locales e internacionales.
Actualmente DJ del artista de regional mexicano Tito Double P además de colaborar en eventos con Travis Scott, Young Miko, Cris MJ, Natanael Cano y más. 

EN
Is a Mexican DJ and Producer with a degree in Music Business. 
He has established himself as one of the most relevant and with huge demand emerging talents, performing over 120 shows per year across Mexico and taking part in international tours, achieving global exposure while representing both Mexico and his hometown.
He is currently the official DJ for regional Mexican artist Tito Double P, and has also collaborated on events with artists such as Travis Scott, Young Miko, Cris MJ, Natanael Cano, among others.
With 11 years of experience, Bones stands out for a career defined by talent, a strong musical identity, and remarkable versatility.
Musical Genres: Latin House, Afro House, Reggaeton, Latin & Club Open Format.

name: Nattali Rize

contributors.name: Nattali Rize
contributors.details:
Nattali Rize is known for high energy, thought provoking and uplifting live performances, the powerhouse international band from Australia & Jamaica channel a deep world & reggae influence to present a one of a kind experience.
With the long awaited sophomore studio album, LIBERATE, released worldwide on March 7th, the Nattali Rize band will be embarking on a global campaign of live shows and opportunities to connect with communities and people around the planet, this powerhouse act will be performing a headline Album Launch Tour in the USA followed by Europe, Australia, Japan and Beyond.
“Nattali is a bright light in the world with a vision that extends beyond the stage.” - Michael Franti
Her global anthem “One People” has amassed over 9 million views on youtube, Nattali and her group continue to connect across borders & waters with many highly acclaimed International festival appearances around the world. “One of the nation’s most refreshing voices” - Rolling Stone
“INFECTIOUS!” - NPR

name: QUIMIKOZ DEL SON

contributors.name: QUIMIKOZ DEL SON
contributors.artist_connection: Label Management, Brand Partnership, Gear Endorsement, Distribution - US, Distribution - Worldwide, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, PR/Publicity Agency, Publishing
contributors.details:
QUIMIKOZ IS A LATINO CUMBIA-FUSION BAND BASED IN DALLAS–FORT WORTH, TEXAS,
DELIVERING A HIGH-ENERGY, BARRIO-FORWARD SOUND ROOTED IN TRADITION AND
REIMAGINED FOR TODAY’S AUDIENCES. BLENDING VALLENATO-STYLE ACCORDION MELODIES
WITH AFRO-CUBAN CUMBIA RHYTHMS, REGGAE GROOVES, HIP-HOP INFLUENCES, AND A
DYNAMIC HORN ENSEMBLE, QUIMIKOZ CREATES AN AUTHENTIC EXPERIENCE THAT HONORS
THE CULTURE OF THE BARRIO WHILE CONNECTING WITH CROWDS ON ANY STAGE.

FORMED IN 2009, QUIMIKOZ HAS PERFORMED AT MAJOR FESTIVALS AND CULTURAL EVENTS
INCLUDING SXSW AS OFFICIAL ARTISTS FOR TWO CONSECUTIVE YEARS, TEXAS RANGERS
CULTURAL EVENTS, MICHELADA FEST FORTH WORTH, CUMBIA NIGHTS AT SUNDANCE SQUARE,
AND OTHER ESTABLISHED COMMUNITY CELEBRATIONS. THEIR 2013 ALBUM QUIMIKOZ 1.0
FEATURES FAN FAVORITES “LLEGÓ LA NEGRA” AND “CUMBIA CAGUAMERA,
” WHILE THEIR 2023
SINGLE “UN DOS TRES!” INTRODUCED THE BAND TO A NEW GENERATION OF LISTENERS.
THEIR SONG “LLEGÓ LA NEGRA” IS FEATURED IN THE AMAZON PRIME SERIES SIN HUELLAS,
EXPANDING QUIMIKOZ’S REACH BEYOND THE STAGE. FROM CLUB VENUES AND LARGE OUTDOOR
FESTIVALS TO PRIVATE AND CORPORATE EVENTS, QUIMIKOZ BRINGS RHYTHM, CULTURE, AND
INFECTIOUS ENERGY TO EVERY PERFORMANCE

name: Enus Sunne

contributors.name: Enus Sunne
contributors.artist_connection: Label Management, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, Booking Agent - UK/Europe, Booking Agent - Worldwide, Producer/Studio Engineer
contributors.details:
SP
Enus Sunne es una figura clave en la evolución de la escena urbana en México. Con más de una década de trayectoria, se ha consolidado como uno de los DJs y productores más completos del país, fusionando versatilidad técnica con una visión empresarial única.
Como CEO y cofundador de Cincodoce, ha transformado la vida nocturna de la CDMX, posicionando el club y su sello discográfico (Cincodoce Music) como referentes internacionales. Su talento lo ha llevado desde el escenario del Coca-Cola Flow Fest hasta clubes emblemáticos en Berlín, Valencia, Montreal y Bogotá.
Más que un DJ, Enus es un curador de experiencias y un visionario que sabe exactamente cómo encender la pista. Su propuesta es, hoy por hoy, un "must" en la escena global.

EN
Enus Sunne, DJ, Producer, and Visionary of the Mexican urban scene.
With a 10-year career, he is the mastermind behind Cincodoce (Club & Music Label) and a benchmark of versatility behind the decks. From Mexico City to the world, he has taken his sound to major stages like Flow Fest and international cities including Berlin and Montreal.

Talent curator and dancefloor architect: Enus Sunne doesn’t just play music—he sets the pulse for what’s next.

name: Tavo Rayo

contributors.name: Tavo Rayo
contributors.artist_connection: Label Management, Brand Partnership, Gear Endorsement, Distribution - Worldwide, Other Artists to Tour With, Booking Agent - US, Booking Agent - Worldwide, PR/Publicity Agency, Producer/Studio Engineer
contributors.details:
Tavo Rayo, a south Texas native rising star in the reggaetón and perreo scene, blends infectious rhythms with magnetic stage energy to captivate audiences across the U.S. and Latin America. Known for his dynamic flow and catchy hooks, he’s rapidly gaining momentum carving out a space as a fresh voice in urban Latin music.

With roots deeply planted in the perreo tradition, Tavo Rayo’s sound is a vibrant fusion of old-school reggaetón beats and modern urbano influences, appealing to both traditional fans and a new generation of listeners. His recent singles have garnered notable playlist placements and rave reviews for their authenticity and dancefloor-ready vibe.

Tavo’s live performances are a high-energy experience, blending charismatic interaction with an electrifying presence that commands the stage and ignites crowd participation. As he continues to expand his footprint bringing authentic Latin flavor, undeniable talent, and an engaging performance that leaves audiences wanting more.
